<script>
  
  //create dataLayer
  window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];

  //load values into dataLayer
  var params = {};
  if ({{CJS - UD - email}}) {
    params.em = {{CJS - UD - email}};
  }
  if ({{CJS - UD - firstName}}) {
    params.fn = {{CJS - UD - firstName}};
  }
  if ({{CJS - UD - lastName}}) {
    params.ln = {{CJS - UD - lastName}};
  }
  if ({{CJS - UD - phone}}) {
    params.ph = {{CJS - UD - phone}};
  }
  if ({{CJS - UD - zipCode}}) {
    params.zp = {{CJS - UD - zipCode}};
  }
  if ({{CJS - UD - city}}) {
    params.ct = {{CJS - UD - city}};
  }
  if ({{CJS - UD - state}}) {
    params.st = {{CJS - UD - state}};
  }
  if ({{CJS - UD - country}}) {
    params.country = {{CJS - UD - country}};
  }
  if ({{CJS - UD - user_id}}) {
    params.external_id = {{CJS - UD - user_id}};
  }

  //FB Pixel code
  !function(f,b,e,v,n,t,s)
  {if(f.fbq)return;n=f.fbq=function(){n.callMethod?
  n.callMethod.apply(n,arguments):n.queue.push(arguments)};
  if(!f._fbq)f._fbq=n;n.push=n;n.loaded=!0;n.version='2.0';
  n.queue=[];t=b.createElement(e);t.async=!0;
  t.src=v;s=b.getElementsByTagName(e)[0];
  s.parentNode.insertBefore(t,s)}(window, document,'script',
  'https://connect.facebook.net/en_US/fbevents.js');
  
  fbq('init', '{{Facebook - Pixel ID}}', params, {
      eventID: {{Event ID}}
    });
  window.dataLayer.push({'event':'fb_initiated'});
  
</script>

<script>
if ( {{CJS - Total Price}} ) {
  fbq('track', 'Purchase', 
    {
      currency: "USD",
      value: {{CJS - Total Price}},
      contents: {{CJS - contents (manual)}}
    },
    {
      eventID: {{Event ID}}
    }
  );
}
</script>

<script>
var em = document.querySelector('.custombox-content input#field_sfdb52421547d5b').value;
var name = document.querySelector('.custombox-content input#field_zrkco3692d20681').value;
var fn = name.split(' ')[0];
var ln = name.split(' ')[1];
localStorage.setItem('em',btoa(em));
localStorage.setItem('fn',btoa(fn));
if (ln) {
  localStorage.setItem('ln',btoa(ln));
}  
</script>

<script>
  
  function getElement( selector, attribute ) {
    var el = document.querySelector( selector );
    if (el) return el[attribute];
    return false;
  }
  
  
  //get email
  var em = getElement('input[name="email"]','value') || "";
  if (em.length > 0) {{CJV - createCookie}}("em", {{CJV - sha256}}(em), 365);
  
  //get first name
  var tmp_ln = "";
  var fn = getElement('input[name="first_name"]','value') || "";
  if (fn.length > 0) {
    //check if poeple provide last name in first name only input
    if (fn.indexOf(' ') > 0) {
      tmp_ln = fn.split(' ')[1];
      fn = fn.split(' ')[0];
      {{CJV - createCookie}}("ln", {{CJV - sha256}}(ln), 365);
    }
    {{CJV - createCookie}}("fn", {{CJV - sha256}}(fn), 365);
  }
  //get last name
  var ln = getElement('input[name="last_name"]','value') || tmp_ln || "";
  if (ln.length > 0) {{CJV - createCookie}}("ln", {{CJV - sha256}}(ln), 365);
  
  //get currency
  var cu = getElement('div.full_checkout_wrapper span.js_currency_code','innerText') || "USD";
  if (cu.length > 0) {{CJV - createCookie}}("cu", cu, 365);
  
  //get total price
  var price = getElement(".left_to_pay","textContent") || localStorage.getItem('price') || "";
  if (price.length > 0) {
    price = price.replace(/[\.]0{2}/, '');
    {{CJV - createCookie}}("value", price, 365)
  };
  
  
</script>

<script>
var fAd = document.createElement("div");
fAd.className = "textads banner-ads banner_ads ad-unit ad-zone ad-space adsbox";
fAd.id = "ad_container";
fAd.style.height = "1px";
document.body.appendChild(fAd);
var x_width = fAd.offsetHeight;
</script>
